name: Support Ticket
description: Support ticket objects describe requests to the Linode support team.

summary._description: This is summary or title for the ticket.

description._description: The full details of the issue or question.

dnszone_id._description: The DNS zone this ticket is regarding, or null.

linode_id._description: The Linode this ticket is regarding, or null.

nodebalancer_id._description: The NodeBalancer this ticket is regarding, or null.

closed_by._description: The user who closed this ticket.

updated_by._description: The user who last updated this ticket.

Status.new: The support ticket has just been opened.
Status.open: The support ticket is open and can be replied to.
Status.closed: The support ticket is completed and closed.
